extendedInfo.description: â [HD] Nature Clock Widgets UCCW âCREW Design brings you this beautiful nature clock widgets. Always wanted to have a nice nature clock on your homescreen, then this is your chance. This Nature Clock Widgets app will change you phone into something new and beautiful. Get a touch of nature in your smartphone. Download this [HD] Nature Clock Widgets UCCW now!â Features17 x (2x2) Clock WidgetsâREQUIREMENTS(!)1. This [HD] Nature Clock Widgets UCCW.2. Ultimate Custom Widget (UCCW): http://bit.ly/TMyXI0âINSTRUCTIONS1. Instal the [HD] Nature Clock Widgets App.2. Search the market for "UCCW". Download the free app UCCW (from VasuDev)3. Touch the screen to add a 2x2 widget in UCCW.4. Choose your own clock (A list with the available clocks will show up)5. You can change the size and location of your clock(s) (when HOTSPOT mode is off) 6. ENJOY!=====EXTRA INFO=====â Hotspotsâ¢ Hotspots mode can be enabled/disabled in UCCW>menu button>Hotspots Mode.â¢ Hotspots mode OFF: editing modeYou can now press on the widgets and you will be taken into an "editing" screen. Here, you can change the format of your time.â¢ Hotspots mode ON: active modeEverything is now active.âNotesâ¢ To set your location for the temperature, go into UCCW>Settings and set your location.â¢ To use Fahrenheit, go into UCCW>settings and un-check Celcius.Enjoy your beautiful new Nature Clock Widgets :)--------------Beware Android 4.1 users:Due to some problems with the Playstore and Android 4.1, some users might not see the NC widgets when adding UCCW widgets. For users that have root access, use Titanium Backup to backup and restore the app. That will fix this problem. If you don't have root, EMAIL me so I can send you a fix.--------------Updates:Theme will be updated according to new features available for UCCW. I will keep improving this app and update this app. Updates will always be free!
